data.title: Horrible service!! Corner of Hesperia rd. and Bear Valley Rd.
data.text: Went inside to order the pizza and salad, man and woman up front were very busy on the phone, so I waited....another guy came and dropped a pizza on the counter called out a number, and walked away...The customer who was waiting for the pizza, also had a 2 liter bottle of soda with his order, but was not given that...so he also waited for someone to come back to the counter to fulfill his order...watching and trying to be patient I asked other customers if the service was like that for them and they replied that it was...and the order to their table was not fulfilled either, that they were still waiting for their salad, this is after the pizza was brought to the table...I decided to leave and go to another pizza house. Wont go back to this one again.

data.title: Horrible Service!!!
data.text: went inside to order pizzas. man at the front was on the phone taking a order. so we waited. he just glanced at us. when he was finished he didn't even acknowledge us and the other 2 customers waiting beside us. he disappeared to the back, then the phone rang again and he came back to take that order. again wouldn't even look at us! I understand he was busy, but could have said "just a minute" or something. so we ended up just leaving

data.title: Actually the pizza of Pizza Hut has a very good tasting to eat the pizza.
data.text: They have reasonable prices for their pizzas, good place to buy them. They do need to work on their menus though.

data.title: Delivery Nightmare
data.text:
I ordered pizza for delivery online using a credit card on Friday night. The pizza arrived on time. but when asked to sign the c/card slip; the driver said he didn't have a pen. What pizza delivery (when pre-charged to your credit card)... doesn't have a pen? I told him that I didn't know offhand where one was either. So he took his flashlight and proceeded to look in his car while my pizza waited. Finally he came back to the door... and told me he couldn't find one. So I said fine; I'd go look. But I pointed out to him that it was not right to require me to sign a credit card slip if he wasn't going to provide a pen. Then to my surprise and disgust he said that "that isn't my job"... 
Then and there I decided that I didn't need that pizza that badly and shut my door and went inside and ordered from a different pizza delivery company. 
Upon communicating with the manager of this Pizza Hut branch; I got a similar attitude. I asked if the owner was available because I know these are frequently (if not always) franchises; but was told he/she was not available. 
In the past we had gotten decent pizza from this branch. It will be a long time before we order again.

data.title: pizza boa
data.text: Adoro a Pizza Hut, tem pizas deliciosas e um atendimento muito bom, aparenta ser um pouco artificial mas é gostosa.
